about_the_game:
After the disaster, some places were filled with birds and flowers, but others became devastated, monsters were rampant, ordinary plants could no longer grow properly, and people had to obtain the necessary resources by selecting older adventurers to enter the place. It is said that the source of all disasters comes from a demon king. Now you will travel alone to the giant tree at the center of the island to find the source and solution to everything, only to never return ......

  • Game Features.

    • Continuously advancing inside the giant tree, carefully choosing items to match and exploring the causes and consequences of battles, stores, and events;

    • Skills can be released through the WERT button, but the order of release is particularly important, players will need to reasonably match skills with the construction of unique item attributes to give full play to its unique charm;

  • Game Mode.

    • Adventure Journey: standard storyline mode, consisting of combat + storyline interpretation, each level will experience a challenging boss battle, after the enemy has been defeated the player can choose to learn about the past life of the enemy, the reason why it already exists here, and for this reason, the developers have given a meaning to the existence of each enemy that exists here;

    • Speedpass mode: according to the information of each level of the enemy in advance with the appropriate items to fight with them, in the shortest possible time to reach the crown of the tree, after registering the parameters of the leaderboards to leave your big name;

    • Endless Battle: Asynchronous 1V1 battles with ever-changing item attributes against the same enemies through powerful on-the-fly responses, how long can you last? [In Development...]

      In addition to experiencing the intense and exciting turn-based strategy battles in this game, the most important thing is to be able to immerse yourself in the significance of the existence of each individual you are battling against, and why they exist here, and why you exist here!

      Translated with (free version)

    • 1, in the demo version players experience the tower climbing + turn-based strategy battle mode

    • 2、End of the battle according to the player's choice can raise the difficulty of the battle / maintain the difficulty at the same time to understand the enemy you fight with the existence of the enemy, we give each enemy individually do a unique small clip animation display

    • 3、At the same time added the leaderboards, achievement system and other content [steam as well as the game within the realization].

    • 4、Provide cloud data storage and asynchronous communication in the form of online message boards, players can browse the communication initiated by other players at different times in the same space through the game function module.

    • 5、Players can save and submit their own data during the battle to the cloud, and then other players can download it through the game's internal module and play against them.

    • [This work only supports Chinese]
